title: Rule
description: An entity representing a rule engine rule

rid.description: The record id of the Rule

active.description: A boolean stating if the rule is active, i.e. can be fired, or not.

ttl.description: An ISO timestamp stating when the rule will be set to inactive.

onLoad.description: Ploson code to run once when loading. For instance to create reusable constants and functions.

cooldown.description: A rule will not be fired again unless this number of seconds has passed.

resetCondition.description: Ploson code to check if rule should reset, if it has fired.

resetAction.description: Ploson code to execute when the rule resets, i.e. when the resetCondition has been met.

condition.description: Ploson code to determine if the rule should fire, i.e. run actions etc.

action.description: Ploson code to execute when condition is met and rule is ready to be fired (reset, cooldown, etc).
